
```{r}
siteNumber <- "11118500"
site_info <- readNWISsite(siteNumber)
parameterCd <- "00060"  # Discharge
startDate <- "2020-01-01"  
endDate <- "2021-10-06" 

# comment(site_info)

discharge <- readNWISdv(siteNumbers	= siteNumber, 
                        parameterCd = parameterCd, 
                        startDate = startDate, 
                        endDate = endDate) %>% 
  renameNWISColumns()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = discharge, aes(x = Date, y = Flow)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_classic()
```
